Johnny Foxes is one of the must-visit locations in Inverness, famous for a great night out, live music friendly staff, a food menu of fan favourites and a wide range of drinks for every taste.

Welcome to Johnny Foxes and The Den.
Choose a venue or scroll down for more. We look forward to seeing you!
.entry-header
Have a question?
Contact Us.
Johnny Foxes and the Den offer two amazing venues under the same roof, capable of catering to a wide range of functions, events and entertainment. Contact us today to enquire about food, drink and our  entertainment at either venue, we’re happy to assist.
Two great venues, one amazing night out!
EAT.DRINK.DANCE
Click below to visit the site for either venue where most of your questions may already have been answered. If you still require assistance send us an enquiry using the form below and someone will be in touch shortly.
